mapper.insert: INSERT TB_CHANGOOS_STUDY_IMAGE (STUDY_SEQ, EDITOR_ID, IMG_PATHNM, IMG_FILENM) VALUES (#{boardSeq}, #{editorID}, #{pathname}, #{filename})
mapper.select: SELECT IMG_SEQ as 'seq', STUDY_SEQ as 'boardSeq', EDITOR_ID as 'editorID', IMG_PATHNM as 'pathname', IMG_FILENM as 'filename', 'BE' as "status" FROM TB_CHANGOOS_STUDY_IMAGE WHERE STUDY_SEQ = #{boardSeq}
